title: User
description: Schema for user documents in Firestore

birthdate.description: The user's birthdate stored as a Firestore timestamp (ISO 8601 string).

created_time.description: The time when the user document was created in Firestore.

display_name.description: The display name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

photo_url.description: The URL of the user's profile photo stored in Firebase Storage or elsewhere.

uid.description: The unique identifier (Firebase Auth UID) of the user.
